@graph.rdfs:comment: OCFC search result common display properties
@graph.dct:description: This is an abstract schema defining properties used in the OCFC search service display screen where the rdsf:label property of the terms definition provides the competency display screen with labels to which mapped schema properties conform.
@graph.rdfs:label: Screen Terms

@graph.rdfs:comment: Abbreviated version of the competency text.
@graph.rdfs:label: Abbreviated Competency Text

@graph.rdfs:comment: Enduring attributes of the individual that influence performance are embodied either directly or indirectly in this resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Ability Embodied

@graph.rdfs:comment: An alternative URI provided by the creator of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Alternative Code

@graph.rdfs:comment: An alternative label provided by the creator of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Alternative Label

@graph.rdfs:comment: The target competency covers all of the relevant concepts in the competency being described as well as relevant concepts not found in the competency being described.
@graph.rdfs:label: Broad Alignment

@graph.rdfs:comment: A coded notation identifying the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Codde

@graph.rdfs:comment: Additional explanatory text for the competency text
@graph.rdfs:label: Error Date

@graph.rdfs:comment: Category to which the competency belongs.
@graph.rdfs:label: Competency Category

@graph.rdfs:comment: The exact text of the competency statement.
@graph.rdfs:label: Competency Text

@graph.rdfs:comment: Level of complexity of the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: Complexity Level

@graph.rdfs:comment: The resource being described includes, comprehends or encompass, in whole or in part, the meaning, nature or importance of the resource being referenced.
@graph.rdfs:label: Comprised Of

@graph.rdfs:comment: Concept keyword or phrase that describing the competency or its context
@graph.rdfs:label: Concept Keyword

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the creator of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Creator

@graph.rdfs:comment: Subject area within a curriculum such as Mathematics, English, Chemistry.
@graph.rdfs:label: Curriculum Subject

@graph.rdfs:comment: Resource from which this resource was derived..
@graph.rdfs:label: Derived From

@graph.rdfs:comment: Level of education of the competency's intended person.
@graph.rdfs:label: Education Level

@graph.rdfs:comment: The relevant concepts in both competencies are coextensive.
@graph.rdfs:label: Exact Alignment

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: Identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Competency framework that this competency is a part of.
@graph.rdfs:label: Is Part Of

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this competency is at the top of some arbitrary hierarchy.
@graph.rdfs:label: Is Top Child Of

@graph.rdfs:comment: Body of information embodied either directly or indirectly in this resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Knowledge Embodied

@graph.rdfs:comment: Human language of the competency text.
@graph.rdfs:label: Language

@graph.rdfs:comment: License text of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: License

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alphanumeric character identifying the posiiton of the resource in a list.
@graph.rdfs:label: List ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: Major overlap of relevant concepts between the two competencies.
@graph.rdfs:label: Major Alignment

@graph.rdfs:comment: Minor overlap of relevant concepts between the two competencies.
@graph.rdfs:label: Minor Alignment

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The competency being described covers all of the relevant concepts in the target competency as well as relevant concepts not found in the target competency.
@graph.rdfs:label: Narrow Alignment

@graph.rdfs:comment: The referenced resource is a prerequisite to this resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Prerequisite

@graph.rdfs:comment: Resource embodied either directly or indirectly in this competency defines a skill in applying knowledge and know-how in completing tasks and solving problems including types or categories of developed proficiency or dexterity in mental operations and physical processes.
@graph.rdfs:label: Skill Embodied

@graph.rdfs:comment: The subject matter of the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Subject

@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifically defined piece of work embodied either directly or indirectly in this resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Task Embodied

@graph.rdfs:comment: Weight assigned to the resource.
@graph.rdfs:label: Weight
